00014 ColorBasedROIExtractorRGB::ColorBasedROIExtractorRGB() {
00015 
00016         this->red = 0;
00017         this->green = 0;
00018         this->blue = 0;
00019         this->distanceThresholdMinimum = 0.0;
00020         this->distanceThresholdMaximum = 0.0;
00021 }

00026 
00027 void ColorBasedROIExtractorRGB::filter(PointCloud3D *originalPointCloud, PointCloud3D *resultPointCloud) {
00028 
00029         if(this->red == 0 && this->green == 0 && this->blue == 0 ) {
00030                 LOG(WARNING) << "[WARNING] Using limits: R=0, G=0, B=0 for RGB based ROI Extraction!!!";
00031         }
00032 
00033         unsigned int cloudSize = originalPointCloud->getSize();
00034         int tempR, tempG, tempB;
00035         uint8_t tempChar;
00036         bool passed;
00037         brics_3d::Point3D tempPoint3D;
00038         resultPointCloud->getPointCloud()->clear();
00039 
00040 
00041         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cloudSize; i++) {
00042                 passed = false;
00043 
00044                 if( (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D() == 0) {
00045                         continue; //this point does not contain color information so skip it
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 //Getting the HSV values for the RGB points
00049                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getR();
00050                 tempR = tempChar << 0;
00051                 tempR = abs(tempR);
00052 
00053                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getG();
00054                 tempG = tempChar << 0;
00055                 tempG = abs(tempG);
00056 
00057                 tempChar = (*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].asColoredPoint3D()->getB();
00058                 tempB = tempChar << 0;
00059                 tempB = abs(tempB);
00060 
00061 //              printf("[INFO] Current R=%d, G=%d, B=%d, \n", tempR, tempG, tempB);
00062 
00063                 double redDistance = (double)(tempR-this->red);
00064                 double greenDistance = (double)(tempG-this->green);
00065                 double blueDistance = (double)(tempB-this->blue);
00066 
00067                 double currentDistance = (redDistance*redDistance) + (greenDistance*greenDistance) +
00068                                                                         (blueDistance*blueDistance);
00069                 currentDistance = std::sqrt(currentDistance);
00070 
00071                 if (currentDistance <= distanceThresholdMaximum && currentDistance >= distanceThresholdMinimum) passed=true;
00072 
00073                 if(passed){
00074 //                      brics_3d::Point3D *tempPoint3D =  new brics_3d::Point3D(originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].getX(),
00075 //                                      originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].getY(),
00076 //                                      originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].getZ());
00077 //
00078 //                      brics_3d::ColoredPoint3D *tempColoredPoint3D = new brics_3d::ColoredPoint3D(tempPoint3D,
00079 //                                      originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].red,
00080 //                                      originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].green,
00081 //                                      originalPointCloud->getPointCloud()->data()[i].blue);
00082 //
00083 //                      out_cloud->addPoint(tempColoredPoint3D);
00084                         resultPointCloud->addPointPtr((*originalPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].clone());
00085 //                      delete tempPoint3D;
00086 //                      delete tempColoredPoint3D;
00087                 }
00088 
00089         }
00090 
00091 
00092 }
00093 
00094 }
